NewsItem.Title: Pakistan wins toss, opts to bat first in second T20 against WI
NewsItem.Description: Pakistan have won the toss and chose to bat first against West Indies in second T20 International match at National Cricket Stadium in Karachi on Tuesday.

NewsItem.Title: Faisal Hasnain appointed new PCB Chief Executive
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - The Pakistan Cricket Board on Monday announced that, following a robust recruitment process, it has appointed Faisal Hasnain as its new Chief Executive.

NewsItem.Title: Llorente guides DP/SS to victory in Brighto Paints Lahore Open Polo
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Andres Llorente fired in fabulous four goals to help Diamond Paints/Sheikhoo Steel outsmart Master Paints by 5-2 in the Brighto Paints Lahore Open Polo Championship 2021 match here at Lahore Polo Club ground on Monday.

NewsItem.Title: DFA Chitral crowned Super Champion of Ufone 4G Football Cup 2021
NewsItem.Description: PESHAWAR - DFA Chitral emerge as title winners after defeating Muslim Club Chaman in the Super Final of Ufone 4G Football Cup 2021 final here at a jam-packed Tehmas Khan Football Stadium Peshawar.

NewsItem.Title: Lahore Hawks rout Desert Camels as 15-side rugby resumes
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Lahore Hawks Rugby Football Club trounced Desert Camels by 52-19 as the Servis Tyres 15-side Rugby League resumed on Monday after a break here at Pakistan Rugby Academy Lahore.

NewsItem.Title: Gujranwala to host Inter-Division Pentathlon C’ship from 26th
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Gujranwala will host the Inter-Division Pentathlon Championship from Dec 26, this was announced by Punjab Modern Pentathlon Association’s (PMPA) newly-elected president Zulfiqar Ahmed Ghumman while addressing the general council meeting here on Monday.

NewsItem.Title: Ghazala, Amina bloom in 1st Quaid Ladies Golf
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Managed by the Lady Captain Golf of Royal Palm Golf Club, Minaa Zainab and fully endorsed by ZIC Oils and their golf playing CEO Shaukat Hassan, the golf playing ladies of Lahore converged to the immaculate par 72 Royal Palm Golf Course to honor, acclaim and revere the memory of Father of the Nation by actively competing in.

NewsItem.Title: 16th Quaid Gold Cup Basketball from 17th
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - The 16th Quaid-e-Azam Gold Cup Basketball Tournament 2021 will roll into action from December 17 at International Abdul Nasser Basketball Court Aram Bagh, Karachi.

NewsItem.Title: Pakistan thump West Indies in first T20I
NewsItem.Description: KARACHI - Pakistan cricket team thumped West Indies by 63 runs in the first encounter of the three-match T20I series here at the National Stadium Karachi on Monday.

NewsItem.Title: Pakistan beat West Indies in first T20
NewsItem.Description: Pakistan have defeated West Indies in first T20 International by 63 runs at National Stadium in Karachi today (Monday).

NewsItem.Title: Confident Pakistan face Covid-hit West Indies in T20Is
NewsItem.Description: KARACHI - High-flying Pakistan start as favourites against a Covid-hit West Indies team in the first of three T20 Internationals in Karachi on Monday.

NewsItem.Title: Franchises finalise squad for PSL 2022
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - The six Pakistan Super League (PSL) franchises on Sunday finalised their squads in quest to lift the glittering trophy at the Gaddafi Stadium in Lahore on March 27.

NewsItem.Title: CC Polo, HN Polo, RD/MP victorious in Brighto Paints Lahore Open
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Coca Cola Polo Team, HN Polo and Rijas Development/Master Paints emerged victorious in the Brighto Paints Lahore Open Polo Championship 2021 here at the Lahore Polo Club ground on Sunday.

NewsItem.Title: Munir sets up victory in 8th JA Zaman Open Golf 2021
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Muhammed Munir of Rawalpindi won the 8th JA Zaman Memorial Open Golf Championship 2021 that concluded here at the 18-hole Lahore Gymkhana Golf Course on Sunday.

NewsItem.Title: Basel shines as Remington Pharma register victory
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Basel Faisal Khokhar excelled in Remington Pharma’s 5½-4 victory over strong Zacky Farms in the Lahore Open Polo League B here at the Lahore Polo Club ground on Sunday.

NewsItem.Title: Football stakeholders urge PM to hand over FIFA House to NC
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - The delay in returning the Football House to Normalisation Committee (NC) is causing serious frustration among the football fraternity, which is strongly demanding the government of handing over the Football House to the NC.

NewsItem.Title: Golfers support education at TCF’s 18th Annual Golf
NewsItem.Description: KARACHI (PR) - On a beautiful Sunday morning, more than 140 passionate golfers came together at the Karachi Golf Club to support education for the less privileged at TCF’s 18th Annual Golf Tournament.

NewsItem.Title: ‘Kaun Baney ga Punjab ka Boxing Champion’ event starts
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - The boxing competitions of ‘Kaun Baney ga Punjab ka Boxing Champion’ got under way at Nishtar Park Sports Complex Gymnasium Hall on Sunday.

NewsItem.Title: Barcelona fails to extend 17-year streak in Champions League knockout stage
NewsItem.Description: An ineffective Barcelona again irked fans this week by failing to live up to expectations in the UEFA Champions League.

NewsItem.Title: Munir, Ahmed lead 8th JA Zaman Open Golf
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Muhammad Munir of Rawalpindi Golf Club and Ahmed Baig of PAF Skyview took lead with a similar illustrious aggregate score of 208, eight under par in the 8th JA Zaman Memorial Open Golf Championship here at Lahore Gymkhana golf course on Saturday.

NewsItem.Title: Remounts, HN, DP/SS win in Brighto Paints Lahore Open Polo
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Remounts, HN Polo and Diamond Paints/Sheikhoo Paints record impressive victories in the ongoing Brighto Paints Lahore Open Polo Championship 2021 matches here at the historic Lahore Polo Club ground on Saturday.

NewsItem.Title: DFA Chitral clinch Ufone 4G KP Football Cup
NewsItem.Description: PESHAWAR - DFA Chitral clinched the Ufone 4G Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Football Cup by outplaying DFA Mardan in the final at a packed Tehmas Khan Stadium, Peshawar on Saturday.

NewsItem.Title: Triple crowns for Asad, one each for Ahtisham, Natalia in 10th Essa Lab National Tennis
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Asad Zaman (McDonald’s) completed the hat-trick of titles while Muhammad Ahtesham and Natalia Zaman clinched the U-18 boys and girls titles in the 10th Addition of Essa Lab National Seniors & Juniors Tennis Championship that concluded at Modern Club Karachi.

NewsItem.Title: Shoaib stuns Aqeel in Federal Cup Tennis men’s singles final
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Twenty-year-old third seed Muhammad Shoaib of PAF stunned top seed Aqeel Khan in a thrilling men’s singles final while Sarah Mehboob beat Ushna Suhail in ladies’ singles final in the 34th Federal Cup National Ranking Tennis Championship that concluded at PTF-SDA Tennis Complex, Islamabad.

NewsItem.Title: Test cricketer Sajid Khan warmly welcomed at Malik Cricket Academy
NewsItem.Description: PESHAWAR - Record holder and Test cricketer Sajid Khan, hailing from a remote village Pishttakhara of Peshawar, was warmly welcomed by locals on arrival at Malik Cricket Academy, where he came to meet his fellow junior players.

NewsItem.Title: Australia take 1-0 Ashes lead with emphatic victory on day four
NewsItem.Description: BRISBANE - Australia have claimed a strong nine-wicket victory over England to take a one-nil lead in the five-match Ashes series.

NewsItem.Title: Franchises finalise player retentions, trades and releases for PSL 2022
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - The retention, trade and release window of the Pakistan Super League (PSL) 2022 closed on Friday afternoon with Islamabad United, Karachi Kings, Lahore Qalandars and Peshawar Zalmi consuming their full allocation of eight retentions, while Multan Sultans and Quetta Gladiators retaining seven players each from the 2021 event.

NewsItem.Title: DP/SS, Barry’s/BN2, Coca Cola victorious in Brighto Paints Lahore Open Polo
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Diamond Paints/Sheikhoo Steel, Barry’s/BN 2 and Coca Cola Polo Team registered convincing victories in the Brighto Paints Lahore Open Polo Championship 2021 matches here at the Lahore Polo Club ground on Friday.

NewsItem.Title: Zubair takes lead in 8th JA Zaman Open Golf
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Muhammad Zubair of Karachi Golf Club managed to command the flow of competitive play by ending the day at a spectacular aggregate score of six under par in the 8th JA Zaman Memorial Open Golf Championship here at the Lahore Gymkhana Golf Course on Friday.

NewsItem.Title: Mardan, Chitral reach final of Ufone 4G Football Cup
NewsItem.Description: PESHAWAR - Football teams of Mardan and Chitral made it to the final of Ufone 4G Football Cup Khyber Pakhtunkhwa here in Tehmas Khan Football Stadium Peshawar on Friday by registering emphatic wins against their opponents.

NewsItem.Title: Ushna/Noor lift ladies doubles title in Federal Cup National Tennis
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Ushna Suhail and Noor Malik – both from Pakistan Wapda - lifted the ladies’ doubles title by beating the duo of Sarah Mehboob and Meheq Khokhar 2-1 in a well-contested final of the 34th Federal Cup National Ranking Tennis Championship at PTF-SDA Tennis Complex, Islamabad.

NewsItem.Title: Mir Chakar Azam Games in South Punjab from 21st
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Taking a big step for the promotion of sports at regional level, Sports and Youth Affairs Department Punjab has decided to organise Mir Chakar Azam Rind Games in South Punjab from Dec 21 to 31.

NewsItem.Title: Pak-India should play bilateral series regularly: Imad Wasim
NewsItem.Description: ISLAMABAD - Pakistan all-rounder Imad Wasim believed cricket can unite nations saying India and Pakistan should play bilateral series regularly against each other as it would be great for both countries.

NewsItem.Title: Afridi becomes a Gladiator for PSL7
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Shahid Afridi will represent Quetta Gladiators in what will be his farewell Pakistan Super League (PSL7) after participating for Multan Sultan’s last year, it was confirmed today.

NewsItem.Title: Asad, Zohaib claim two titles each in 10th Essa Lab National Tennis
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Asad Zaman and Zohaib Afzal Malik (SA Gardens) clinched two titles each and both are still eyeing the third titles as both will feature in U-14 and U-12 finals respectively in the 10th Essa Lab National Seniors & Juniors Tennis Championship that will conclude today (Friday) at Modern Club Karachi.

NewsItem.Title: Hamid Zaman plans to make JA Zaman Golf an int’l championship
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - The 8th JA Zaman Memorial Open Golf Championship will get geared up at the Lahore Gymkhana Golf Course from Thursday and over the next three days, the best golf players of the country will be seen in action.

NewsItem.Title: Three matches decided as Lahore Open Polo declared opened
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Three matches were decided on the third day of the Brighto Paints Lahore Open Polo Championship 2021 that was formally declared opened by the sponsors Brighto Paints and management of Lahore Polo Club.

NewsItem.Title: Aqeel, Abid reach Federal Cup National Tennis semifinals
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE -Aqeel Khan, M Abid, Yousaf Khalil and M Shoaib reached the men’s singles final in the 34th Federal Cup National Ranking Tennis Championships being played at hard courts of PTF-SDA Tennis Complex, Islamabad.

NewsItem.Title: Punjab spikers to take part in Inter-Provincial Volleyball C’ship
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE -Punjab male and female teams will participate in Inter-Provincial U-17 Boys and U-16 Girls Volleyball Championship scheduled to be staged in Mirpur, Azad Jammu and Kashmir from Dec 16 to 18.

NewsItem.Title: Pak hockey team off to Dhaka for Men’s Asian Champions Trophy
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Punjab Minister for Sports and Youth Affairs Rai Taimoor Khan Bhatti on Thursday saw off the Pakistan hockey team with best wishes to participate in Men’s Asian Champions Trophy to be played in Dhaka, Bangladesh from Dec 14 to 22, 2021.

NewsItem.Title: Shahid Afridi to represent Quetta Gladiators in PSL 7
NewsItem.Description: Shahid Afridi will represent Quetta Gladiators in what will be his farewell HBL Pakistan Super League 7 after participating for Multan Sultan’s last year, it was confirmed today.

NewsItem.Title: Sajid Khan’s heroics help Pakistan sweep Test series
NewsItem.Description: DHAKA - Off-break bowler Sajid Khan bagged 12 wickets in the entire match as Pakistan beat Bangladesh by an innings and 8 runs at the Shere Bangla Stadium in Mirpur, Dhaka to help visitors clean sweep 2-match Test series 2-0.

NewsItem.Title: Asad, Ahsan, Nadir enter 10th Essa Lab Tennis U-14 semis
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Asad Zaman (McDonald’s), Ahsan Ahmed and Nadir Mirza reached the semifinals of the 10th Essa Lab National Seniors & Juniors Tennis Championship 2021 after winning their respective quarterfinals at Modern Club Karachi.

NewsItem.Title: HN, Remounts, Barry’s/BN 2 win in Brighto Paints Lahore Open Polo
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - HN Polo, Remounts and Barry’s/BN 2 carved out contrastive victories in the Brighto Paints Lahore Open Polo Championship 2021 matches here at the Lahore Polo Club ground on Wednesday.

NewsItem.Title: Aisamul Haq inaugurates PTF’s JTI Program at DPS
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - International tennis star and pride of the country Aisam-ul-Haq Qureshi on Wednesday inaugurated the PTF’s JTI Program, which is supported by the International Tennis Federation (ITF).

NewsItem.Title: Aqeel, Abid reach tennis quarterfinals
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Top seed Aqeel Khan, M Abid, Barkatullah, Heera Ashiq, Yousaf Khalil, Mudassir Murtaza, M Shoaib and Hasheesh Kumar reached the quarterfinals of 34th Federal Cup National Ranking Tennis Championship at S Dilawar Abbas PTF Tennis Complex on Wednesday.

NewsItem.Title: Pakistan squash referees Asif, Sajjad excel at int’l level
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Two Pakistani squash referees Asif Khan and Sajjad Ahmad are excelling at international events and holding Pakistani flag aloft across the globe.

NewsItem.Title: Boxer Waseem keen to represent Pakistan in next Olympics
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Pakistan’s celebrated boxer Mohammad Waseem has expressed his determination to represent Pakistan in the next Olympic Games.

NewsItem.Title: Sajid Khan rips through Bangladesh after Pakistan declare early
NewsItem.Description: DHAKA - Sajid Khan’s maiden six-wicket haul left Bangladesh in danger of being made to follow-on with one day of the Dhaka Test to go.

NewsItem.Title: Punjab Sports Minister appoints Mikaeel as goodwill ambassador of SBP
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Punjab Minister for Sports and Youth Affairs Rai Taimoor Khan Bhatti appointed tennis prodigy 12-year-old Mikaeel Ali Baig, who called on him at National Hockey Stadium, as Goodwill Ambassador of the Sports Board Punjab (SBP) here on Tuesday.

NewsItem.Title: BN/DP, MP, Rijas/MP win Brighto Paints Lahore Open Polo openers
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - BN/Diamond Paints, Master Paints and Rijas/Master Paints won the opening day matches of the Brighto Paints Lahore Open Polo Championship 2021 that got underway here at the Lahore Polo Club ground on Tuesday.

NewsItem.Title: Steps being taking to conduct int’l events in Karachi: Commissioner
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Commissioner Karachi Muhammad Iqbal Memon has said that steps are being taking to conduct international events in Karachi, which is the safest city in the world for sports.

NewsItem.Title: 10th Essa Lab National Tennis Championship formally inaugurated
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - The 10th Essa Lab National Seniors and Juniors Tennis Championship 2021 was formally inaugurated at the Modern Club.

NewsItem.Title: Zameen.com, Jaffer Brothers reach finals in Super League
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Two semifinals of the Premier Super League were played at Ittefaq Cricket Ground, Model Town.

NewsItem.Title: Federal Cup National Ranking Tennis C’ship commences
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - The 34th Federal Cup National Ranking Tennis Championship commenced at the S Dilawar Abbas PTF Tennis Complex on Tuesday.

NewsItem.Title: ACB delegation arrives Pakistan to inspect security, Covid-19 situation
NewsItem.Description: KARACHI - A four-member delegation of Australian Cricket Board (ACB) including security experts has arrived in Pakistan to review security arrangements and Covid-19 situation in Karachi, Islamabad and Lahore prior to the scheduled matches in March and April 2022.

NewsItem.Title: Rain washes out day three in Dhaka
NewsItem.Description: DHAKA - The third day of the second Test between Bangladesh and Pakistan in Dhaka was abandoned without a ball being bowled due to persistent rain.

NewsItem.Title: Captains named for Pakistan tour in Pollard’s absence
NewsItem.Description: Barbados - Failing to recover from the hamstring injury that he suffered at the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup, Kieron Pollard will not be a part of West Indies tour of Pakistan in December.

NewsItem.Title: 28-player women emerging camp to begin on 10th in Multan
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - As many as 28 women cricketers will undergo skills and fitness training at the Inzamam-ul-Haq High Performance Centre, Multan in the emerging women’s camp, which begins on December 10.

NewsItem.Title: Federal Cup National Tennis main draw matches from today
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Ahmad Kamil, Kamran Khan, Mahatir Muhammad, M Usman Ejaz, Talha Bin Asif, Abbas Khan, Jabir Ali and Shaheen Mehmood qualified for the main draw of men’s singles by winning their respective matches on the opening day of J7-34th Federal Cup National Ranking Tennis Championships 2021 at S Dilawar Abbas PTF.

NewsItem.Title: Farhan, Bilal advance in 10th Essa Lab National Tennis
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Farhan Altaf, Bilal Soomro, Vinod Das and Ibrahim Iltafat advanced to the next round of the 10th Essa Lab National Tennis Championship 2021 after winning their respective matches.

NewsItem.Title: 10th Lahore Open Polo Championship 2021 rolls into action today
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - The 10th Lahore Open Polo Championship 2021 will stroll into action here at the historic Lahore Polo Club (LPC) from today (Tuesday).

NewsItem.Title: Over 80 boys and girls feature in Punjab’s table tennis trials
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - The Sports Board Punjab (SBP) conducted table tennis trials for the selection of Punjab’s U-17 male and U-16 female table tennis teams at Nishtar Park Sports Complex (NPSC) Gymnasium Hall on Monday.

NewsItem.Title: Zalmi continues activities before start of PSL7
NewsItem.Description: Lahore - PSL franchise, Peshawar Zalmi, continues its activities before Pakistan Super League season seven.

NewsItem.Title: PM announces to revamp entire sports structure
NewsItem.Description: ISLAMABAD - Prime Minister Imran Khan announced re­vamping of the entire sports structure in Pakistan, saying the government is striving to take Pakistan forward in international sports through various measures includ­ing talent-hunting, development of sports grounds, reforms in sports bodies and elim­ination of mafias from various.

NewsItem.Title: Manchester United beat Crystal Palace 1-0 on new manager Ralf Rangnick's debut
NewsItem.Description: Manchester United defeated Crystal Palace 1-0 in English Premier League week 15 game on Sunday, their first match with head coach Ralf Rangnick at the helm.

NewsItem.Title: Army, Sindh lift DHA Men, Women Boxing team trophies
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Pakistan Army won the DHA 38th Men National Boxing Championship team trophy followed by Wapda and Pakistan Navy while Sindh lifted the team trophy for DHA 2nd Women Elite National Boxing Championship followed by Punjab and Islamabad.

NewsItem.Title: Zacky Farms lift Super League Polo title
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Zacky Farms clinched another title of this polo season by beating Country Lions in the Coca Cola Super League Polo main final here at the Lahore Polo Club ground on Sunday.

NewsItem.Title: Rain plays spoilsport on day two of Pak-BD Test
NewsItem.Description: DHAKA - Play was called off early on day two in Mirpur in the second Test between Bangladesh and Pakistan due to persistent rain.

NewsItem.Title: PAF win 30th CAS Challenge Cup Polo Tournament
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Pakistan Air Force (PAF) won the 30th Chief of Air Staff (CAS) Challenge Cup Polo Tournament, which was played at the lush green Islamabad Polo Club.

NewsItem.Title: Remounts win Corps Commander Polo Cup
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Remounts clinched another eight-goal title by beating Rijas Development/Master Paints by 7-5 while Faysal Funds won the subsidiary final in the Corps Commander Polo Cup 2021 sponsored by Diamond Paints that concluded here at the Jinnah Polo Fields (JPF) on Sunday.

NewsItem.Title: Azhar, Umar claim Table Tennis titles
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - The NNG Table Tennis Tournament 2021 concluded at the North Nazimabad Gymkhana, where Azhar Khursheed, Umar Qazi emerged winners in senior and junior categories.

NewsItem.Title: Ushna completes hat-trick of titles in HTR National Tennis
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Pakistan ladies champion Ushna Suhail completed the hat-trick of the titles in the 6th Hassan Tariq Rahim National Ranking Tennis Championship 2021 that concluded here at Lahore Gymkhana Club tennis courts on Sunday.

NewsItem.Title: Parkha wins gross title in 4th PGA Ladies Amateur Golf
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Parkha Ijaz won the gross title in the 4th PGA Ladies Amateur Golf Championship 2021 that concluded here at the superbly-maintained Lahore Gymkhana Golf Course on Sunday.

NewsItem.Title: Malik congrats PTF chief on Pak U-12 team’s title win
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - PLTA Secretary and former Davis Cupper Rashid Malik has congratulated Pakistan U-12 team on winning the ITF Asia 12&Under Team Competition.

NewsItem.Title: 10th Essa Lab National Tennis gets underway
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - The 10th Essa Lab National Tennis Championship got underway on Sunday.

NewsItem.Title: Navy down Wapda to win National Volleyball
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Pakistan Navy downed Wapda to win the 52nd Engro National Senior Men’s Volleyball Championship that concluded here at the Punjab Sports’ Gymnasium Hall on Saturday night.

NewsItem.Title: Lewandowski hopes 'Messi's words about Ballon d'Or were not empty'
NewsItem.Description: Bayern Munich striker Robert Lewandowski claimed that losing the Ballon d'Or 2021 to Lionel Messi was a big hit for him, saying he felt sad all week after coming so close to winning the prize.

NewsItem.Title: Liverpool star Michael Owen joins Govt's 'Kamyab Jawan Sports Drive'
NewsItem.Description: The Prime Minister Imran Khan along with the former England and Liverpool star Michael Owen have unveiled a future-proof football plan in a special strategic public private partnership between Kamyab Jawan and Global Soccer Ventures (GSV).

NewsItem.Title: Karachi Club crowned SSB Cup Basketball champions
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Karachi Basketball Club beat strong Mamba Squad Basketball Club by 54-42 to emerged as champions of the Shah Abdul Latif Bhattai SSB Cup Basketball Tournament 2021 that concluded at International Abdul Nasser Basketball Court Aram Bagh, Karachi.

NewsItem.Title: Muzammil, Shoaib, Ushna, Sarah in HTR Ranking Tennis final
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Muzammil Murtaza and M Shoaib and Ushna Suhail and Sarah Mehboob entered the men’s and ladies’ singles finals of the 6th Hassan Tariq Rahim National Ranking Tennis Championship 2021 after winning their respective semifinals played here at the Lahore Gymkhana Club tennis courts on Saturday.

NewsItem.Title: Pak-Argentina Exhibition Polo Match ends in a 5-5 draw
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - The Brighto Paints High Goal Exhibition Polo Match, played between Pakistan and Argentina in celebration of 70 years of Diplomatic Relations between the two countries, ended in a 5-5 draw here at the historic Lahore Polo Club (LPC) ground on Saturday.

NewsItem.Title: NZ’s Ajaz Patel becomes third bowler to take 10 wickets in an innings
NewsItem.Description: MUMBAI - New Zealand’s Mumbai-born spinner Ajaz Patel claimed all 10 Indian wickets in the second Test, becoming only the third bowler in cricket history to achieve the feat on Saturday.

NewsItem.Title: DHA Lahore National Boxing Championship finals today
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Total 19 semifinals in men categories and seven semifinals bouts in women categories were decided in the DHA Lahore 38th Men & 2nd Women Elite National Boxing Championship here at Captain Fasih Babar Amin (Shaheed) Sports Complex, Phase 6, DHA Lahore.

NewsItem.Title: PAF win third position in National Volleyball Championship
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Pakistan Air Force (PAF) clinched the third position beating Army 3-1 in the Engro 52nd National Senior Men’s Volleyball Championship here at the Punjab Sports’ Gymnasium Hall on Saturday.

NewsItem.Title: Pakistani skiers set to compete in Beijing 2022 Winter Olympics
NewsItem.Description: ISLAMABAD - Pakistani athletes are all set to participate in the 24th Olympics Games also known as the Beijing 2022 Winter Olympics.

NewsItem.Title: Babar Azam half-century puts Pakistan in front after see-saw day
NewsItem.Description: DHAKA - Pakistan ended the opening day of their second Test against Bangladesh at 161/2, with bad light forcing abandonment of the final session in Dhaka.

NewsItem.Title: Pakistan look to sweep Bangladesh Test series
NewsItem.Description: DHAKA - Pakistan cricket team is looking to sweep the Bangladesh Test series 2-0 as the second Test commences today (Saturday) in Dhaka.

NewsItem.Title: Remounts, RD/MP reach Corps Commander Polo final
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Remounts and Rijas Development/Master Paints squeezed into the main final of the Corps Commander Polo Cup 2021 sponsored by Diamond Paints after winning their respective semifinals played here at the Jinnah Polo Fields (JPF) on Friday.

NewsItem.Title: Country Lions, Zacky Farms in Super League Polo final
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Country Lions and Zacky Farms qualified for the main final of the Coca Cola Super League Polo 2021 after winning their respective semifinals played here at the historic Lahore Polo Club on Friday.

NewsItem.Title: Multan to open title defence against Karachi in PSL7
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - The countdown of the Pakistan Cricket Board’s marquee event, the Pakistan Super League 2022, began on Friday when the schedule of the seventh edition of one of the most popular and competitive cricket leagues was announced on Friday.

NewsItem.Title: Aisam/Aqeel enter HTR Tennis men’s doubles final
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Pakistan tennis duo of Aisam-ul-Haq Qureshi and Aqeel Khan reached the men’s doubles finals of the 6th Hassan Tariq Rahim National Ranking Tennis Championship 2021 after winning their semifinals played here at the Lahore Gymkhana Club tennis courts on Friday.

NewsItem.Title: National Boxing Championship reaches semifinals stage
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Total 20 quarterfinals bouts and seven semifinals bouts in men categories and six semifinals bouts in women categories were decided on fourth day of the DHA Lahore 38th Men & 2nd Women Elite National Boxing Championship being played at Captain Fasih Babar Amin (Shaheed) Sports Complex, Phase 6, DHA Lahore.

NewsItem.Title: KP U21 Games ends, Peshawar win overall trophy
NewsItem.Description: PESHAWAR- Peshawar District clinched the overall trophy of the Khyber Pakhtunkhwa U21 Inter-District Games, which concluded here at Peshawar Sports Complex on Friday with hands full of joys and memories.

NewsItem.Title: 10th Essa Lab National Seniors & Juniors Tennis from today
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - The 10th Essa Lab National Seniors & Juniors Tennis Championship 2021 will commence from today (Saturday) at the hard courts of Modern Club Karachi.

NewsItem.Title: Karachi Club face Mamba Squad in SSB Cup Basketball today
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Karachi Basketball Club will face Mamba Squad Basketball in the final of the Shah Abdul Latif Bhattai SSB Cup Basketball Tournament 2021 at Aram Bagh, Karachi.

NewsItem.Title: Wapda, Navy reach National Senior Men’s Volleyball final
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Pakistan Wapda and Pakistan Navy qualified for the final of the Engro 52nd National Senior Men’s Volleyball Championship at the Punjab Sports’ Gymnasium Hall here on Friday.

NewsItem.Title: Pak vs WI: Pakistan allows full capacity stadium for West Indies series
NewsItem.Description: The National Command and Control Center (NCOC) has reportedly allowed a full capacity crowd at the National Stadium in Karachi to watch the matches between Pakistan and West Indies.

NewsItem.Title: PCB names squads for West Indies series, Asia Cup, U19 World Cup
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) selectors on Thursday announced national squads for the upcoming home series against the West Indies as well as the U19 Asia Cup and the ICC U19 Cricket World Cup West Indies 2022.

NewsItem.Title: Faysal Funds, BN/DP qualify for Corps Commander Polo subsidiary final
NewsItem.Description: LAHORE - Faysal Funds Polo and BN Polo/Diamond Paints qualified for the subsidiary final of the Corps Commander Polo Cup 2021 sponsored by Diamond Paints after winning their respective matches played here on Thursday.
